list_definition.definition: the room or building in which the business of a firm is done

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The firm’s head offices are in New York

list_definition.definition: the room in which a particular person works
a room or building used for a particular purpose

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Train tickets are bought at the ticket-office.

list_definition.definition: a position of authority, especially in or as a government

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Our party has not been in office for years
